title: Pixel Stand problems in device manager under Windows 10
content:
I tried to make a post but it was "violating the community policy" and I don't know why so here is a short version:
Have Pixel Stand Problem
Shows up in Device Manager (Win 10) but with warnings (See picture)

I have attached my previous attempt at posting as an image so maybe someone can tell my why it was violating the community policy.

Best regards
Julian Tompa
